a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Monthly surface temperature anomalies by decade, United States
Average decadal deviation of a specific month's average surface temperature from the 1991-2020 mean, in
Data source: Copernicus Climate Change Service (2024)
Note: The numbers 1 to 12 on the horizontal axis represent the months of the year, from 1 for January to 12 for December. Note that the
decadal average for 2020, comprising fewer than the typical 10 data points, may introduce greater uncertainty compared to other
